item.title: Résumé
item.author: Logan Senko
item.description: Education Bachelor of Communication, BCMM  2023, Information Design Major  Mount Royal University (MRU)  President’s Honour Roll, GPA 3.85 Red Seal, Chef  2008, Diploma in Culinary Arts  Southern Alberta Institute of Technology (SAIT)  Honours Designation, GPA 4.0 Work Experience Instructional Designer  2021 Summer Intern, Canada Energy Regulator (CER) Collaborated to projects across departments, timezones, and security clearances, working remotely using scrums.

item.title: Communicating Needs: Digital Literacy
item.author: Logan Senko
item.description: Contructed a system map to contextualize the social complexity and interdependencies by communicating the profound impact of digital literacy in determining overall quality of health.

item.title: Pipelines & Procedures
item.author: Author
item.description: Evaluated existing documentation and generated a set of recommendations which addressed maintenance, accessibility, and information architecture.

item.title: Onboarding & Procedures
item.author: Author
item.description: Identified the unique barriers of onboarding inexperienced and remote employees and revised the existing documentation to reflect those needs and reduce said barriers.
